block.p: Anne Spencer Wiedemann, the daughter of Barbara Hazeltine Symmers Bancroft of Upper Brookville, N.Y., and George Stanhope Wiedemann of Palo Alto, Calif., was married last evening to John William Churchill, the son of Alix Churchill of South Brewham, England, and the late William Churchill. The Rev. Boniface Ramsey performed the Roman Catholic ceremony St. Dominic's Chapel in Oyster Bay, N.Y.

Mrs. Churchill, 29, is an interior designer in New York. Her father, who was until earlier this month the chairman of Grey Direct, the direct marketing agency in New York, is now the president of Responsys.com, an online direct-marketing company in Palo Alto. Her mother is a commissioner of the Long Island State Park, Recreation and Historic Preservation Commission in Babylon, N.Y.

Anne Spencer Wiedemann, the daughter of Barbara Hazeltine Symmers Bancroft of Upper Brookville, N.Y., and George Stanhope Wiedemann of Palo Alto, Calif., was married last evening to John William Churchill, the son of Alix Churchill of South Brewham, England, and the late William Churchill. The Rev. Boniface Ramsey performed the Roman Catholic ceremony St. Dominic's Chapel in Oyster Bay, N.Y.

Mrs. Churchill, 29, is an interior designer in New York. Her father, who was until earlier this month the chairman of Grey Direct, the direct marketing agency in New York, is now the president of Responsys.com, an online direct-marketing company in Palo Alto. Her mother is a commissioner of the Long Island State Park, Recreation and Historic Preservation Commission in Babylon, N.Y.

Mr. Churchill, 34, is the director of investment funds in New York for the SG Cowen Securities Corporation, an investment banking subsidiary of Societe Generale, the Paris bank. He graduated from the University of St. Andrews, in Scotland. His father was a senior counsel at John Swire & Sons, the Far East trading company, in London.
